attributes.action: Reverse the government decision to allow Huawei to build part of the 5G network
attributes.background: We should be listening to our ‘5 eyes’ partners, security experts and the general public’s view that allowing Huawei to build any part of the 5G IT infrastructure in the UK is dangerous for our future security.
